name: Template 1
html:
[wprm-recipe-print style="inline-button" border_radius="8px" vertical_padding="11px" icon="" icon_color="#f54242" text_color="#098ce9" button_color="#ffffff" border_color="#098ce9" text_style="normal" horizontal_padding="20px"] [wprm-recipe-name tag="h2" text_style="bold"] [wprm-spacer size="20px"] [wprm-recipe-meta-container fields="times" style="separate" time_shorthand="1" table_border_width="1px" table_borders="none" label_style="normal" icon_color="#f54242" label_prep_time="Prep Time:" label_cook_time="Cook Time:" label_total_time="Total Time: "] [wprm-recipe-meta-container style="separate" time_shorthand="1" table_border_width="1px" table_borders="none" fields="custom" nutrition_unit_separator=" " nutrition_daily="0" nutrition_unit="1" text_style="normal" label_style="normal" selected_fields="servings,calories" icon_servings="" icon_calories="" icon_color="#f54242" label_servings="Serves: " label_calories="Calories: "]
[wprm-spacer size="40px"] [wprm-recipe-ingredients header="Ingredients" notes_style="faded" header_decoration="none" header_line_color="#e0e0e0" header_style="uppercase" group_style="normal" unit_conversion="header" unit_conversion_style="buttons" unit_conversion_button_background="#ffffff" adjustable_servings="header" servings_text_style="normal" servings_button_background="#ffffff" unit_conversion_button_radius="3px" servings_button_radius="3px" unit_conversion_button_accent="#616161" servings_button_accent="#616161" list_style="checkbox" group_tag="h4" serving_options_any_value="2" advanced_servings="before" ingredients_style="regular"] [wprm-recipe-image default="350x350" size="850x450" style="normal" rounded_radius="0px"] [wprm-recipe-instructions header="Instructions" text_margin="5px" image_size="medium" header_decoration="none" header_line_color="#e0e0e0" header_style="uppercase" media_toggle="header" toggle_button_accent="#616161" toggle_on_icon="camera-2"] [wprm-recipe-notes header="Notes" header_decoration="none" header_line_color="#e0e0e0" text_style="normal" header_style="uppercase"] [wprm-recipe-video header="" header_decoration="none" header_line_color="#e0e0e0" header_style="uppercase"]
